languages.text: "Исключено!" {n}Впервые вы слышите, как хормейстер повышает голос.{/n} "Она — ведьма... мерзость! Она лишь ухудшит ситуацию — варповы твари почуют ее податливую к ереси душу и слетятся на нас".

"Absolutely not!" {n}This is the first time you have ever heard the Choirmaster raise his voice.{/n} "She is a witch... an abomination! She will only make the situation worse! The beasts of the warp will sense her heresy-prone soul and descend upon us in droves."
languages.original_text: "Исключено!" {n}Впервые вы слышите, как хормейстер повышает голос.{/n} "Она — ведьма... мерзость! Она лишь ухудшит ситуацию — варповы твари почуют ее податливую к ереси душу и слетятся на нас".

traits.locale_text: "Absolutely not!" {n}This is the first time you've ever heard the Choirmaster raise his voice.{/n} "She is a witch... an anathema! She will only make the situation worse! The warp's abominations will sense her heresy-prone soul and descend upon us in droves."

"Absolutely not!" {n}This is the first time you've ever heard the Choirmaster raise his voice.{/n} "She is a witch... an anathema! She will only make the situation worse! The warp's abominations will sense her heresy-prone soul and descend upon us in droves."

"Absolutely not!" {n}This is the first time you have ever heard the Choirmaster raise his voice.{/n} "She is a witch... an abomination! She will only make the situation worse! The beasts of the warp will sense her heresy-prone soul and descend upon us in droves."

"Absolutely not!" {n}This is the first time you have ever heard the Choirmaster raise his voice.{/n} "She is a witch... an abomination! She will only make the situation worse! The beasts of the warp will sense her heresy-prone soul and descend upon us in droves."

languages.text: «¡De ninguna forma!». {n}Es la primera vez que oyes al maestro de Coro levantar la voz.{/n} «Es una bruja... ¡una abominación! ¡Solo empeorará la situación! Las bestias de la disformidad sentirán que su alma es susceptible a la herejía y caerán sobre nosotros en masa».
languages.original_text: "Absolutely not!" {n}This is the first time you have ever heard the Choirmaster raise his voice.{/n} "She is a witch... an abomination! She will only make the situation worse! The beasts of the warp will sense her heresy-prone soul and descend upon us in droves."

traits.locale_text: «¡De ninguna forma!». {n}Es la primera vez que oyes al maestro de Coro levantar la voz.{/n} «Es una bruja... ¡una abominación! ¡Solo empeorará la situación! Las bestias de la disformidad sentirán que su alma es susceptible a la herejía y caerán sobre nosotros en masa».

languages.text: 「それはありえない！」{n}クワイアーマスターが声を張り上げる姿は初めて見た。{/n}「彼女は魔女…呪われし者だ！彼女が関われば状況は悪くなるのみ！<歪み>の獣たちが、彼女の異端の魂を感じ取り、大挙して襲いかかるだろう」
languages.original_text: "Absolutely not!" {n}This is the first time you have ever heard the Choirmaster raise his voice.{/n} "She is a witch... an abomination! She will only make the situation worse! The beasts of the warp will sense her heresy-prone soul and descend upon us in droves."

traits.locale_text: 「それはありえない！」{n}クワイアーマスターが声を張り上げる姿は初めて見た。{/n}「彼女は魔女…呪われし者だ！彼女が関われば状況は悪くなるのみ！<歪み>の獣たちが、彼女の異端の魂を感じ取り、大挙して襲いかかるだろう」

languages.text: “绝对不行！”{n}这是你第一次听到唱诗大师提高了音量。{/n}“她是个女巫……是个被诅咒的怪物！她只会让情况变得更糟！亚空间里的凶兽会察觉到她的异端思想，成群结队涌向我们。”
languages.original_text: "Absolutely not!" {n}This is the first time you have ever heard the Choirmaster raise his voice.{/n} "She is a witch... an abomination! She will only make the situation worse! The beasts of the warp will sense her heresy-prone soul and descend upon us in droves."

traits.locale_text: “绝对不行！”{n}这是你第一次听到唱诗大师提高了音量。{/n}“她是个女巫……是个被诅咒的怪物！她只会让情况变得更糟！亚空间里的凶兽会察觉到她的异端思想，成群结队涌向我们。”

languages.text: "Auf gar keinen Fall!" {n}Du hast noch nie erlebt, dass der Chormeister die Stimme hebt.{/n} "Sie ist eine Hexe ... eine Abscheulichkeit! Sie macht die Lage nur schlimmer! Die Bestien des Warps werden ihre zur Ketzerei neigende Seele spüren und in Scharen über uns herfallen."
languages.original_text: "Absolutely not!" {n}This is the first time you have ever heard the Choirmaster raise his voice.{/n} "She is a witch... an abomination! She will only make the situation worse! The beasts of the warp will sense her heresy-prone soul and descend upon us in droves."

traits.locale_text: "Auf gar keinen Fall!" {n}Du hast noch nie erlebt, dass der Chormeister die Stimme hebt.{/n} "Sie ist eine Hexe ... eine Abscheulichkeit! Sie macht die Lage nur schlimmer! Die Bestien des Warps werden ihre zur Ketzerei neigende Seele spüren und in Scharen über uns herfallen."

languages.text: « Jamais de la vie ! {n}C'est la toute première fois que vous voyez le maître de chœur hausser le ton.{/n} C'est une sorcière... que dis-je, une abomination ! Son intervention ne ferait qu'aggraver les choses ! Les engeances du Warp détecteraient aussitôt son âme propice à l'hérésie et elles nous tomberaient dessus par milliers. »
languages.original_text: "Absolutely not!" {n}This is the first time you have ever heard the Choirmaster raise his voice.{/n} "She is a witch... an abomination! She will only make the situation worse! The beasts of the warp will sense her heresy-prone soul and descend upon us in droves."

traits.locale_text: « Jamais de la vie ! {n}C'est la toute première fois que vous voyez le maître de chœur hausser le ton.{/n} C'est une sorcière... que dis-je, une abomination ! Son intervention ne ferait qu'aggraver les choses ! Les engeances du Warp détecteraient aussitôt son âme propice à l'hérésie et elles nous tomberaient dessus par milliers. »

languages.text: "Hayatta olmaz!" {n}İlk defa Koro Şefi'nin sesini yükselttiğini duyuyorsun.{/n} "O bir cadı... Ucubenin teki! Durumu daha da kötüye götürmekten başka bir şey yapamaz! Öteboyut yaratıkları, onun kâfirliğe meyilli ruhunu sezip sürü hâlinde üzerimize çökerler."
languages.original_text: "Absolutely not!" {n}This is the first time you have ever heard the Choirmaster raise his voice.{/n} "She is a witch... an abomination! She will only make the situation worse! The beasts of the warp will sense her heresy-prone soul and descend upon us in droves."
